abstract: Chile advances to Copa America quarterfinals with 4-2 win over Panama in Philadelphia; other Copa America news noted.
lead_paragraph: Eduardo Vargas and Alexis Sanchez each scored twice as Chile beat Panama, most likely setting up a matchup with Mexico on Saturday.

headline.main: Chile, Defending Champion, Makes Copa América Quarterfinals
headline.print_headline: Chile 4, Panama 2; Defending Champ Makes Quarterfinals

snippet: Eduardo Vargas and Alexis Sanchez each scored twice as Chile beat Panama, most likely setting up a matchup with Mexico on Saturday.
